item.title: Short form product summary videos with AI (Oxolo) - Upwork
item.description:
We have our own range of products https://www.vesternet.com/collections/brands-vesternet

And are producing a simple video for each one.

We're not having anything custom produced but instead using this AI tool which does 95% of the heavy lifting: www.oxolo.com

That tool still needs a bit of video editing after the AI has done the first draft, for choosing the right images, voice over, text etc.

If you're a video editor and have used that tool then great.

item.title: Video Editor for One TikTok Video - Upwork
item.description:
Hello there!
We have an E-commerce Advertising Agency and we’re looking for a video editor for short TikTok videos.

AT FIRST, WE NEED ONLY ONE TIKTOK VIDEO.

You have to generate your own footage, according to the voiceover and subtitles, provided by us. This can turn into a long-term partnership if we're satisfied with your work.
In the case of a long-term partnership, we will need around 15 videos/week.
Here are some examples of what we need:
- https://www.tiktok.com/@motminute?_t=8nIsla5CJhw&_r=1

- https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8FTnXLxsV7/?igsh=NmNjanBpMmY2dGs=

- https://vm.tiktok.com/ZGege6js5/

----
Also start your cover letter with the word “Cherry” so I know that you’ve read the job description.
We’re looking for somebody ASAP!

Budget: $5

item.title: VSL Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video editor who can help us with editing VSLs (Video Sales Letters) for our ecommerce store.

Usually, these VSLs are around 5-10 minutes long and are made mostly from stock footage and UGC content of our product created in the past.

Most of the time, we are rewriting scripts of other successful VSLs and updating them to fit our product.

Your main task will be using these VSLs as inspiration and trying to follow their shots, making them relevant for our product and audience.

So basically, you are re-creating working VSLs.

Additionally, you will be updating VSLs we already created with new angles or hooks so we can continue testing new VSLs with ads.

We are looking for a person who is smart, has common sense, and is willing to spend time learning about our products, the problems they solve, the benefits they offer customers, and to deeply understand our customers' minds. This way, every piece of footage you pick will resonate with the customer.

We will provide you with all UGC content, stock footage, and examples of VSLs that worked in the past.

The goal is to re-create successful VSLs in our industry and adapt them to our products.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 13:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Quick Explainer Video (whiteboard?) for Fundraising Project - Upwork
item.description:
Explainer Video Needed - Online Fundraiser

We run a custom apparel business that focuses on selling apparel to our partner school's fans.

We are launching our Fall Football Fundraiser and need a quick explainer animation video to help explain the process.
We will host an online store with a custom hat for a football team and sell to their fans and pay them the profits.

We are doing a wide campaign to new schools to participate and need a video to help quickly summarize the process.

Video will be approx 30-45 seconds

Script will be provided.

I think a simple whiteboard animation will be good, but open to other ideas. Some of the 2d standard explainer videos seem kind of cheap. But again - open to your creative suggestions.

Please include references to something similar (if available) - either apparel sales, apparel production, team sports, etc

Thanks

Hourly Range: $9.00-$39.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 13:54 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Whiteboard Animation, 2D Animation, Animation, Graphic Design, Illustration, Motion Graphics, Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: Whiteboard Animation, 2D Animation, Animation, Graphic Design, Illustration, Motion Graphics, Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Superhero Themed Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can create a superhero themed video for our project. The video will feature action-packed scenes, special effects, and dynamic transitions. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of superhero themes and be able to bring our vision to life. Responsibilities will include selecting and editing footage, adding visual effects, sound editing, and color grading. The final video should be engaging, visually stunning, and aligned with our brand.

Skills required:
- Video editing software proficiency (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong knowledge of visual effects and motion graphics
- Ability to work with green screens and chroma keying
- Attention to detail and excellent storytelling abilities

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months.

Expertise level: Intermediate

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 18, 2024 13:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Short Form Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
You must have experience editing "talking head" videos.

This will be a long term position if we work well together and you are creative and diligent in your work.

Looking to get an average of 3 videos edited per week.

This will be consistent, and I need someone who is talented at editing and a good communicator.

$5-$15/video.
Respectfully, please do NOT apply if you will try to charge more - this is my budget.

I'm ready to hire ASAP.

To apply, I will have you read a detailed breakdown of how I want my editing style, then you will create a short clip to show me you are capable of following these instructions (I am NOT looking for free work, but for me to know you're actually effective at editing, I need to see that you can follow instructions well, so creating a sample is a part of the application process.)

To start the application, please say "Send me the loom" in your application, so I know you read this, and I'll send you instructions for round 2 of applications.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 13:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Visual Effects, Video Transition, Instagram Reels, Dynamic Transition, Graphic Design, Animation
Skills: Visual Effects, Video Transition, Instagram Reels, Dynamic Transition, Graphic Design, Animation
Country: United States

item.title: YouTube Video Editor & Template Designer with DaVinci Resolve Expertise - Upwork
item.description:
I am a watercolor artist seeking a skilled and experienced video editor who is proficient in DaVinci Resolve to help create engaging YouTube content. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of YouTube video production, including building templates for consistent video quality and editing content to retain viewer engagement.

Responsibilities:

Design and create video templates tailored for my YouTube channel
Edit video footage to produce high-quality, engaging content
Incorporate creative elements to enhance viewer experience and retention
Ensure all edits and final videos are consistent with my artistic style and brand
Collaborate on content ideas and provide feedback for continuous improvement
Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing, specifically for YouTube
Proficiency in DaVinci Resolve (must use this software exclusively)
Strong portfolio showcasing previous video editing work
Ability to create visually appealing and engaging content
Understanding of YouTube analytics and best practices for video engagement
Excellent communication skills and attention to detail
Ability to meet deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in creating content related to art, especially watercolor painting
Familiarity with my YouTube channel and style

I look forward to working with a talented video editor who can help take my YouTube content to the next level!



Budget: $100
Posted On: June 18, 2024 13:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Demo Video, Footage-Based Video, Color Grading, Compositing, DaVinci Resolve, Video Intro & Outro, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Demo Video, Footage-Based Video, Color Grading, Compositing, DaVinci Resolve, Video Intro & Outro, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Video Production
Country: United States

item.title: Business intro Youtube Video to improve SEO - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a 1-2 minute YouTube video introducing my company's services to embed in my website and improve my SEO...

I do not have any video footage to use only images so i need someone to edit a professional-looking video brochure with images, graphic design, bullet points, voiceover, transitions etc...

The video should have a bulleted summary, timestamps and be broken up with sub headlines. i want the video transcribed to show in my blog and i want the the URL to that blog in the caption of my youtube video to use as a backlink. the name of the video should be keyword relevant. I am also open to any other suggestions as to ways of improving my websites seo with you youtube videos. Please submit previous videos you have made that also do not include video footage

item.title: Expert Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

We are a Digital marketing agency located right outside of Silicon Valley CA that specializes in the automotive industry. We are seeking an expert level video editor that is able to display a high level of editing skill. A major focus for us is to develop high educational & engaging business content for social media. We would like to see Alex Hormozi, Gary Vee & Grant Cardone type of content editing.

Qualifications:
- Provide a high level of communication which includes daily updates when working on an assigned project.
- Able to work under strict deadlines that still allows plenty of time (we DO NOT rush work) to deliver a high quality edit.
- Stable internet connection and has all softwares needed to fully edit high quality videos.
- Understands the different video dimensions required on Facebook and Instagram and up to the challenge to attempt to produce viral videos.
- Preferably understands the difference between a marketing video and a content video.
- Proficient in Adobe products and experience editing Log footage.

More Info:
We are looking for a high energy, positive, and motivated individual that would like an opportunity to grow with a fast moving Digital marketing agency in CA US. The hired individual will likely be a solution oriented leader who always get the job done. This person should have a high level of attention to detail and a border line perfectionist at video editing.

***If this individual performs highly, they will be offered continued work and possibly a full time position.

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 18, 2024 13:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor, Capcut or premiere/Davinci. I need LIVE examples of work, decent likes and views++ - Upwork
item.description:
Hi I have multiple businesses and I also do a little bit of video production for other people I mainly use davinci resolve cloud but it doesn't matter what you use just I'm after people that can make decent content and I have plenty of work some of it will be longer form but a lot of it will be short form I will just give you different things and you could go in ahead and do whatever you want.
To the top of the list go, people with their own high traffic channels or viral content that they have created or people that have worked with people that do put out a lot of content per week and have a workflow that they can bring with them. I work flow as in how do we preview the videos how do we do it is how do we get them to you how do we do the approvals etc and then great if you could post them as well that would be awesome but you know whatever let's see what you can do!

I need a video editor and the most important thing is that you've created things in the past that people have clicked like on and watched! So I really need proof of this I don't need any wedding show rules or any kind of experience that you've had I don't care at all I just want to get links to things that you have created that have decent likes and to use even if that is only like a 100 likes or 10,000 views whatever the hell it is it doesn't matter just none of no puke wedding show rules or any crap like that please!
